eu_initiatives: As FDC exploits database rights, it is mainly interested in Database Directive and associated rights, including copyright protection for databases.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: FDC is jointly owned by the English Premier League and the English Football League.  It represents the interests of those parties, and additionally the Scottish Professional Football League Limited (together the "Leagues") in relation to the exploitation of (i) the database of matches played as part of the League competitions ("Fixture Lists") and (ii) live data concerning football matches played as part of their respective football competitions ("Live Data").
relevant_communication: All relating to Database Directive and associated rights
